title: Unveiling the Magic of Python - A Versatile Language for All
description: Arrays are one of the fundamental data structures in JavaScript, used to store multiple values in a single variable.
author: John Kufre
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:r,jsxs:n}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(a){const l={code:"code",figure:"figure",h2:"h2",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",...a.components};return n(e,{children:[r(l.p,{children:"Arrays are one of the fundamental data structures in JavaScript, used to store multiple values in a single variable. In this guide, we'll explore the basics of JavaScript arrays, including how to create, access, and manipulate them."}),"
",r(l.h2,{id:"creating-arrays",children:"Creating Arrays"}),"
",r(l.p,{children:"You can create an array in JavaScript using the array literal syntax, which consists of square brackets []. For example:"}),"
",r(l.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:r(l.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"javascript","data-theme":"github-dark",children:r(l.code,{"data-language":"javascript","data-theme":"github-dark",style:{display:"grid"},children:n(l.span,{"data-line":"",children:[r(l.span,{style:{color:"#F97583"},children:"let"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:" fruits "}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#F97583"},children:"="}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:" ["}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#9ECBFF"},children:"'Apple'"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:", "}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#9ECBFF"},children:"'Banana'"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:", "}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#9ECBFF"},children:"'Orange'"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"];"})]})})})}),"
",r(l.h2,{id:"accessing-array-elements",children:"Accessing Array Elements"}),"
",r(l.p,{children:"You can access individual elements in an array using square bracket notation and the index of the element. Remember, JavaScript arrays are zero-indexed, meaning the first element is at index 0. For example:"}),"
",r(l.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:r(l.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"javascript","data-theme":"github-dark",children:n(l.code,{"data-language":"javascript","data-theme":"github-dark",style:{display:"grid"},children:[n(l.span,{"data-line":"",children:[r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"console."}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#B392F0"},children:"log"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"(fruits["}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#79B8FF"},children:"0"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"]); "}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#6A737D"},children:"// Output: 'Apple'"})]}),"
",n(l.span,{"data-line":"",children:[r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"console."}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#B392F0"},children:"log"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"(numbers["}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#79B8FF"},children:"2"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"]); "}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#6A737D"},children:"// Output: 3"})]})]})})}),"
",r(l.h2,{id:"array-methods",children:"Array Methods"}),"
",r(l.p,{children:"JavaScript arrays come with a variety of built-in methods for manipulating their contents. Some common methods include:"}),"
",r(l.p,{children:"push(): Adds one or more elements to the end of an array."}),"
",r(l.p,{children:"pop(): Removes the last element from an array and returns it."}),"
",r(l.p,{children:"shift(): Removes the first element from an array and returns it."}),"
",r(l.p,{children:"unshift(): Adds one or more elements to the beginning of an array."}),"
",r(l.p,{children:"slice(): Returns a shallow copy of a portion of an array into a new array."}),"
",r(l.p,{children:"splice(): Changes the contents of an array by removing or replacing existing elements and/or adding new elements."}),"
",r(l.h2,{id:"iterating-over-arrays",children:"Iterating Over Arrays"}),"
",r(l.p,{children:"You can iterate over the elements of an array using loops such as for loops or array methods like forEach(), map(), filter(), etc. For example:"}),"
",r(l.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:r(l.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"javascript","data-theme":"github-dark",children:n(l.code,{"data-language":"javascript","data-theme":"github-dark",style:{display:"grid"},children:[n(l.span,{"data-line":"",children:[r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"fruits."}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#B392F0"},children:"forEach"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"("}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#FFAB70"},children:"fruit"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#F97583"},children:" =>"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:" {"})]}),"
",n(l.span,{"data-line":"",children:[r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"  console."}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#B392F0"},children:"log"}),r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"(fruit);"})]}),"
",r(l.span,{"data-line":"",children:r(l.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"});"})})]})})})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:n}=e.components||{};return n?r(n,{...e,children:r(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Former Citi Middle East and Africa CFO, Mitesh Popat joins Flutterwave as Chief Financial Officer
description: Africa’s leading payments technology company, has announced the appointment of Mitesh Popat as the company’s Chief Financial Officer.
author: John Kufre
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const a={h2:"h2",p:"p",...t.components};return i(e,{children:[n(a.h2,{id:"lagos-nigeria-september-5th-2024",children:"Lagos, Nigeria, September 5th, 2024"}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Flutterwave, Africa’s leading payments technology company, has announced the appointment of Mitesh Popat as the company’s Chief Financial Officer."}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Mitesh brings 20 years of global financial services experience across North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Africa, which will be instrumental in driving Flutterwave’s next phase of growth and financial sustainability. Most recently, he has held executive roles at Citi including as Chief Financial Officer for Middle East and Africa, overseeing finance operations across 29 countries, and CFO for Global Equities Sales and Trading, providing financial leadership for all aspects of a $5 billion revenue business."}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"As CFO for Middle East and Africa at Citi, Mitesh partnered with the regional and division CEO on strategic direction, performance management, and balance sheet optimization, while also communicating the business’s financial story to internal and external stakeholders."}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"In his new role at Flutterwave, Mitesh will be responsible for overseeing Flutterwave’s corporate finance functions. This is to support the company’s growth plans, leveraging his expertise in managing finance and operation functions of a complex global business. He will also ensure balanced resource allocation and strategic execution across Flutterwave."}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Commenting on his appointment, Mitesh Popat, Chief Financial Officer of Flutterwave, said, “I am excited to have joined the Flutterwave team at this important time in the company’s journey. I have a deep understanding of the operating environment in Africa and complexity of operating an emerging market business and I plan to bring my experience in growing Flutterwave, while optimising our business model for sustained profitability. I am looking forward to working with the team to enhance Flutterwave’s financial position and drive operational efficiencies through curiosity and innovation.”"}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Welcoming Mitesh, Olugbenga ‘GB’ Agboola, Founder and CEO of Flutterwave, said, “We have an ambitious goal to connect Africa to the world and Mitesh embodies our vision with his experience working extensively within Africa in a global capacity. He shares our values of customer obsession and we’re certain that with his impressive track record in financial management, he will contribute to the next phase of our growth. As our new CFO,  his work will be adding value to our customers – both enterprise merchants and retail remittance customers, as well as the African fintech ecosystem.”"}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Last year, Flutterwave announced the appointment of several new executives from companies such as PayPal, Stripe, and Western Union. The new executives, including Mitesh, reinforce the company’s commitment to recruiting top talent, improving financial operations, and investing in risk management strategies such as compliance, loss reduction, and prevention to drive growth"})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:i}=e.components||{};return i?n(i,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
